duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and sales support in a retail environment, addressing customer needs and offering solutions.
Perform phone repair, key cutting, and technical tasks, such as replacing screens, batteries, and other components on smart phones and tablets.
Gain a solid understanding of the company's electronic retail and cross-referencing system to assist customers effectively.
Utilize technical skills to work with small parts and tools for phone repair and device repair.
Communicate effectively with customers, demonstrating excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Maintain a clean driving record for positions requiring driving and the ability to lift 50+ lbs as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/equivalent and 6 months prior work experience preferred or equivalent combination of education and experience
